home.title: QR Code Service
home.subtitle: Find lost items with QR codes
home.description: A reliable way to return lost items. Create a QR code with your contact information and attach it to valuable items.

steps.1: Create a QR code with your contact information
steps.2: Print and attach to your items
steps.3: If someone finds your item, they can contact you

qrGenerator.title: QR Code Generator
qrGenerator.enterInfo: Enter contact information to create a QR code

examples.title: QR Code Usage Examples
examples.description: Discover how QR codes can be useful in various aspects of life

bag.title: Bags and Backpacks
bag.description: Add a QR code to your bag or backpack so that if lost, the finder can easily contact you

keys.title: Keys and Keychains
keys.description: Attach a QR code to your keychain to make it easy to return if lost

pet.title: Pet Collars
pet.description: Place a QR code on your pet's collar with contact information for quick return

wallet.title: Wallets and Documents
wallet.description: Add a QR code to your wallet or important documents for quick return if lost

luggage.title: Luggage and Suitcases
luggage.description: Attach a QR code to your luggage to simplify the identification and return process

phone.title: Phones and Gadgets
phone.description: Add a QR code to your phone case or other gadget for quick return

event.title: Event Tickets
event.description: Use QR codes for electronic tickets to concerts, exhibitions, and other events

restaurant.title: Restaurant Menus
restaurant.description: Place a QR code on the table for quick access to the menu and ordering

business.title: Business Cards
business.description: Add a QR code to your business card for quick contact information saving

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.name: Your Name
feedback.success: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you soon.

errors.messageTooShort: Message must be at least 10 characters long
errors.submitFailed: An error occurred while submitting the message. Please try again later.

errors.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long
errors.logoutFailed: An error occurred while signing out
